name: touch the flag
description:
Hello, this is touch the flag my game for the WOWIE game jam. It is very simple but hopefully fun to play.

A and D to move

it is possible that you can only see half of the flag (In that case the weird little cube on the right is the flag). Why? i dont know, but maybe the flag isnt that important. If you really want to see the whole flag, sometimes it is possible to just play in fullscreenmode to fix this bug.

reach the flag, or will failing be more fun?
